title: Attorney
context: ยง431:4-405 Attorney. Attorney as used in this part refers to the attorney-in-fact of a reciprocal insurer. The attorney may be an individual, partnership, or corporation. The principal office of the attorney for a domestic reciprocal insurer shall be maintained within this State. [L 1987, c 347, pt of ยง2; am L 2003, c 212, ยง37]
